thread.title: Mum captures heart-warming moment her baby sees her face for the first time
thread.title_full: Mum captures heart-warming moment her baby sees her face for the first time

title: Mum captures heart-warming moment her baby sees her face for the first time
text:
Mum captures heart-warming moment her baby sees her face for the first time Last updated 15:54, February 22 2017 @mortilemil/ INSTAGRAM 
At four months old, baby Emil receives glasses - and his reaction is priceless. 
It's a moment Danish mum Christine A.J Friis Rosenhoj will never forget â€“ her four-month-old son has just received glasses and now, for the first time, he can see her clearly. 
Baby Emil looks startled at first, but when he looks up and sees the face of his mother his face lights up and he beams with happiness. 
Christine was able to capture the amazing moment on camera. Sharing the video on Instagram she captioned: "Today is a great day. Emil got his glasses. The journey has been long and our little baby had to go through a lot to sit here and smile with his small glasses, but now they're here." (Translated from Danish). 
Emil was born with extreme far-sightedness, and needed glasses with a +7 prescription strength in order to correct it. Feb 13, 2017 at 10:48am PST
